Title: 36 Hours
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), Thomas L. Moran, David Renaud (executive story editor), Karen Struck (executive story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (story editor), Mark Rozeman (staff writer), Brian Shin (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita
Plot: Glassman is recovering from a surgery; Tensions rise in Dr. Melendez's OR; Shaun and Morgan need to get through a surprise 36 hour shift at the ER.
